就咁整個size 52 既array, 用for loop放晒52 張牌入去，之後再random個array個排位，會唔會易啲？

始終你玩21點都應該係拎52 張牌，再洗亂佢，再拎最面個張派比人

依個辦法應該係最易，for loop完1到52實落個array再shuffle，如果可以用List果d，直接用下面個Collections.shuffle應該最快
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/18470094/how-to-shuffle-an-array

不過如果係功課既話，我諗佢想你其實random 52個唔重複既number，如果係咁既話，就for loop 52次，每次for loop random gen一個1-52之間既數，如果之前無依個數就實落去個array，else就再random

Btw，唔好用notepad++寫Java，出到去會俾人笑

依個辦法應該係最易，for loop完1到52實落個array再shuffle，如果可以用List果d，直接用下面個Collections.shuffle應該最快

不過如果係功課既話，我諗佢想你其實random 52個唔重複既number，如果係咁既話，就for loop 52次，每次for loop random gen一個1-52之間既數，如果之前無依個數就實落去個array，else就再random

Btw，唔好用notepad++寫Java，出到去會俾人笑

其實搵隻有natural language特性o既programming language寫都可以近似pseudo code

例如AppleScript寫shuffle

[code]
set cardList to {}
repeat with i from 1 to 52
set end of cardList to i
end repeat
set lastPosition to the length of cardList
repeat while lastPosition is greater than 1
set randomPosition to random number from 1 to lastPosition - 1
set tempValue to item randomPosition of cardList
set item randomPosition of cardList to item lastPosition of cardList
set item lastPosition of cardList to tempValue
set lastPosition to lastPosition - 1
end repeat
set AppleScript's text item delimiters to ", "
display dialog cardList as string
[/code]
